mapper.select: select seats_ids from mtime_order_t where field_id=#{filedId} and (order_status=0 or order_status=1 )
select * from mtime_order_t where order_user=#{userId} order by order_time desc

select mot.UUID orderId, mhfit.film_name filmName,mft.begin_time fieldTime, mct.cinema_name cinemaName, mot.seats_name seatsName, mot.order_price orderPrice, mot.order_status orderStatus, mot.order_time orderTimestamp from mtime_order_t mot,mtime_hall_film_info_t mhfit,mtime_field_t mft,mtime_cinema_t mct where mot.order_user=#{userId} and mot.film_id=mhfit.film_id and mft.UUID=mot.field_id and mct.UUID=mot.cinema_id
